page.title: 06Trade and Commerce (2)
page.content:
At Lea Forge, about one mile from Wybunbury, is a wholesaler serving the Licence trade with beers and soft drinks.The business employs staff on the premises and for delivering within a 20 miles radius using their own vehicles.
There are three hostelries in the area.Two of these, the Red Lion and the Swan are in Wybunbury, the third, the Boar's Head is at Walgherton.The Swan has recently been developed as a Motel, while the Boar's Head offers restaurant facilities.
There are two shops in Wybunbury.One sells groceries and sundry items and also doubles as a Post Office.There is a similar establishment at Hough.The second shop in Wybunbury is a Butcher's.
